FlowDefinition.description: Created as a part of 2023 R4 enhancements (US-717, US-741, US-868). This flow triggers when a Grant Approval, Donor Agreement, or Fund Request Case is created or updated to a Closed status. Depending on the Case Reason and Status, it sends a Chatter Notification to the relevant user(s).
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: GP Cases Created/Closed --> Send Chatter Notification
